greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A symmetric square array of numbers, read by antidiagonals.
formula: Square array defined by T(n, k)=(k^2n^2+2kn+1)
xref: Rows include A000290, A016754, A016778, A016814, A016862, A016922, A016994. Main diagonal is A082044. Other diagonals include A058031, A000583, A062938. Diagonal sums (row sums if viewed as number triangle) are A082045.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 03 2003
